info.title: Torn API
info.description:
* The development of Torn's API v2 is still ongoing.
 * If selections remain unaltered, they will default to the API v1 version.
 * Unlike API v1, API v2 accepts both selections and IDs as path and query parameters.
 * If any discrepancies or errors are found, please submit a [bug report](https://www.torn.com/forums.php#/p=forums&f=19&b=0&a=0) on the Torn Forums.

get.summary: Get a faction's hall of fame rankings.
Get your faction's hall of fame rankings.
Get a list of a faction's members
get.description: The 'revive_setting' value will be populated (not Unknown) if you're requesting data for your own faction and have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as 'Unknown'.

get.summary: Get a list of your faction's members
get.description: The 'revive_setting' value will be populated (not Unknown) if you have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as 'Unknown'.
The 'is_enlisted' value will be populated if you're requesting data for your faction and have faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as null.
The 'is_enlisted' value will be populated if you have API faction permissions (with custom, limited or full access keys), otherwise it will be set as null.

get.summary: Get a faction's wars & pacts details
Get your faction's wars & pacts details

get.description: It is possible to pass up to 10 categories at the time (comma separated). Categories 'attack', 'depositFunds' and 'giveFunds' are only available with 'Custom', 'Limited' or 'Full' access keys.

get.summary: Get a list of a faction's completed chains
Get a list of your faction's completed chains

get.description: Chain reports for ongoing chains are available only for your own faction.

get.summary: Get your faction's latest chain report
get.description: This includes currently ongoing chains.
It's possible to get older entries either by timestamp range (from, to) or with offset.

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description: Category of organized crimes returned. Category 'available' includes both 'recruiting' & 'planning', and category 'completed' includes both 'successful' & 'failure'

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns crimes created after this timestamp

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns crimes created before this timestamp

get.description:
*  UserPersonalStatsFull is returned only when this selection is requested for the key owner with Limited, Full or Custom key.
 *  UserPersonalStatsFullPublic is returned when the requested category is 'all'.
 *  UserPersonalStatsPopular is returned when the requested category is 'popular'. Please try to use UserPersonalStatsPopular over UserPersonalStatsFullPublic wherever possible in order to reduce the server load.
 *  Otherwise, UserPersonalStatsCategory is returned for the matched category.
 *  It's possible to request specific stats via 'stat' parameter. In this case the response will vary depending on the stats requested. Private stats are still available only to the key owner (with Limited or higher key).
 *  Additionally, historical stats can also be fetched via 'stat' query parameter, but 'timestamp' parameter must be provided as well. It's only possible to pass up to 10 historical stats at once (the rest is trimmed). When requesting historical stats the response will be of type UserPersonalStatsHistoric.

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: Stat names (10 maximum). Used to fetch historical stat values

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Returns stats until this timestamp (converted to nearest date).

get.description:
* UserPersonalStatsFull is returned only when this selection is requested with Limited, Full or Custom key access key.
 * UserPersonalStatsFullPublic is returned when the requested category is 'all'.
 * UserPersonalStatsPopular is returned when the requested category is 'popular'. Please try to use UserPersonalStatsPopular over UserPersonalStatsFullPublic wherever possible in order to reduce the server load.
 * Otherwise, UserPersonalStatsCategory is returned for the matched category.
 * It's possible to request specific stats via 'stat' parameter. In this case the response will vary depending on the stats requested. Private stats are still available only to the key owner (with Limited or higher key).
 * Additionally, historical stats can also be fetched via 'stat' query parameter, but 'timestamp' parameter must be provided as well. It's only possible to pass up to 10 historical stats at once (the rest is trimmed). When requesting historical stats the response will be of type UserPersonalStatsHistoric.

parameters.name: cat
parameters.description: Stats category. Required unless requesting specific stats via 'stat' query parameter

parameters.name: stat
parameters.description: Stat names (10 maximum). Used to fetch historical stat values

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Returns stats until this timestamp (converted to nearest date).

get.summary: Get threads for a specific player
get.description: Returns 100 threads per page for a specific player. When requesting data for the key owner, a field 'new_posts' is also available, indicating the amount of unread posts. Minimum API key is required for that.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorted by the greatest of first_post_time and last_post_time timestamps

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns threads created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns threads created after this timestamp

get.description: Returns 100 threads per page. The field 'new_posts' is also available, indicating the amount of unread posts with a Minimum API key (or higher).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorted by the greatest of first_post_time and last_post_time timestamps

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Returns threads created before this timestamp

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Returns threads created after this timestamp

get.summary: Get updates on threads you subscribed to
get.description: This selection returns data visible in 'Subscribed Threads' section on forum page. Threads are sorted in the same way as on site.

get.summary: Get updates on your threads and posts
get.description: This selection returns data visible in 'Feed' section on forum page. Feed is sorted by timestamp descending. Only a maximum of 100 rows are returned.

get.summary: Get updates on your friends' activity
get.description: This selection returns data visible in 'Friends' section on forum page. Feed is sorted by timestamp descending. Only a maximum of 100 rows are returned.

get.summary: Get hall of fame rankings for a specific player
get.description: The battle_stats selection will be populated only when requesting selection with Limited, Full or Custom key and for yourself.

get.summary: Get your hall of fame rankings
get.description: When requesting selection with Limited, Full or Custom key, battle_stats selection will be populated.

get.summary: Get your competition's event start time
get.description: Only available to yourself.

get.summary: Get bounties placed on a specific user
Get your item market listings for a specific item

get.description: Choose one or more selections (comma separated).

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Timestamp until when rows are returned

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Timestamp after when rows are returned

next.description: Auto-generated link to get the next set of records.

prev.description: Auto-generated link to get the prev set of records.

ForumFeedTypeEnum.description:
This represents the type of the activity. Values range from 1 to 8 where:
 *                    1 = 'X posted on a thread',
 *                    2 = 'X created a thread',
 *                    3 = 'X liked your thread',
 *                    4 = 'X disliked your thread',
 *                    5 = 'X liked your post',
 *                    6 = 'X disliked your post',
 *                    7 = 'X quoted your post'.

is_interrupted.description: This is an experimental flag which should help determine 'assist' attacks which have not contributed to the chain. For example, attacks such as where the opponent lost to someoene else before the attacker could finish the attack. This flag might not work entirely correctly, so use with caution.

UserLastAction.description: Details about a user's last action.

is_enlisted.description: Indicates if the faction is enlisted for ranked wars. Available only with faction AA permissions for your own faction.

until.description: The duration until when is the non-aggression pact valid.

target.description: The score target of the war.

factions.description: The factions involved in the ranked war.
The factions involved in the raid war.

target.description: The score target of the war.

factions.description: The factions involved in the territory war.

cooldown.description: Timestamp until when chain is on cooldown.

joined_at.description: The timestamp at which the user joined the slot.

progress.description: Current planning progress on the slot.

item_requirement.description: Details of item required for the slot, if applicable.

is_reusable.description: Shows if the item is reusable or consumed during the crime.

is_available.description: Shows if user has the required item.

user.description: Details about the user joined the slot, if any.

created_at.description: The timestamp at which the crime was created.

initiated_at.description: Replaced by the 'planning_at' field (same value). This field will be removed in the future (early March or later).

planning_at.description: The timestamp at which the planning phase for the crime has begun.

ready_at.description: The timestamp at which the crime will be ready.

expired_at.description: The timestamp at which the crime will expire.

rewards.description: Details about the crime rewards. Available only for crimes with 'Successful' status.

FactionSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'armor', 'boosters', 'caches', 'cesium', 'contributors', 'crimeexp', 'currency', 'donations', 'drugs', 'medical', 'positions', 'rankedwars', 'reports', 'revives', 'revivesfull', 'stats', 'temporary', 'upgrades', 'weapons'.

views.description: Total number of times players have opened this thread.

is_legacy.description: Indicates whether post was made using the old formatting engine which doesn't use HTML.

content.description: depending on the input 'cat' parameter, this will either return raw value (with HTML) or plain text. Legacy posts are returned as is, they can't be stripped of tags.

new_posts.description: Available only when requesting data for yourself (no id or your id) with at least 'Minimal' access type key.

id.description: This field will be removed on Monday, 20th January 2025.

uid.description: This field will be removed on Monday, 20th January 2025.

id.description: This field will be removed on Monday, 20th January 2025.

MarketSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'pointsmarket'.

value.description: Value representing the chosen category. Traveltime is shown in seconds. If the chosen category is 'rank', the value is of type string. If the chosen category is 'racingskill', the value is of type float. Otherwise it is an integer.

chain.description: Maximum chain achieved by the faction. Null if chosen category is 'rank' or 'respect'.

chain_duration.description: The duration of the chain. Null if chosen category is 'rank' or 'respect'.

rank.description: The full rank title & division of the faction.

lister_id.description: If the bounty is anonymous this field is null.

lister_name.description: If the bounty is anonymous this field is null.

TornSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'bank','cards','cityshops','companies','competition','dirtybombs','education','factiontree','gyms','honors','itemdetails','items','itemstats','medals','organisedcrimes','pawnshop','pokertables','properties','rackets','raidreport','raids','rankedwarreport','rankedwars','rockpaperscissors','searchforcash','shoplifting','stats','stocks','territory','territorynames','territorywarreport','territorywars'.

time_played.description: This field is being replaced with 'activity'.'time' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

current_streak.description: This field is being replaced with 'activity'.'streak'.'current' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

best_streak.description: This field is being replaced with 'activity'.'streak'.'best' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

time_played.description: This field is being replaced with 'activity'.'time' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

current_streak.description: This field is being replaced with 'activity'.'streak'.'current' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

best_streak.description: This field is being replaced with 'activity'.'streak'.'best' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

hunting_skill.description: This field is being replaced with 'hunting'.'skill' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

trash.description: This field is being replaced with 'dump' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

energy.description: This field is being replaced with 'energy_drinks' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

trash.description: This field is being replaced with 'dump' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

energy.description: This field is being replaced with 'energy_drinks' field and will be removed on 1st January 2025.

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the stat was last updated

PersonalStatsCriminalOffenses.description: Response for PersonalStatsCriminalOffenses depends on which crime version user is currently.

criminal_offenses.description: This object is being replaced with 'crimes' object (PersonalStatsCrimes) and will be removed on 1st January 2025. Response for PersonalStatsCriminalOffenses depends on which crime version user is currently.

PersonalStatsCrimes.description: Response for PersonalStatsCrimes depends on which crime version user is currently.

UserPersonalStatsCategory.description: Schema name corresponds to the requested category

PersonalStatsCategoryEnum.description: Important! Value 'criminal_offenses' is deprecated, and will be removed on 1st of January 2025.

PersonalStatsStatName.description: Important! Value 'hunting' is deprecated, and will be removed on 1st of January 2025.

miscellaneous.description: Miscellaneous stats for specific crime. Results differ based on the cat id.

battle_stats.description: This field is null when requesting data for other players.

start_time.description: Event start time displayed in TCT.

UserSelectionName.description: The following selections will fallback to API v1 and may change at any time: 'ammo','attacks','attacksfull','bars','basic','battlestats','bazaar','cooldowns','criminalrecord','discord','display','education','equipment','events','gym','honors','icons','inventory','jobpoints','log','medals','merits','messages','missions','money','networth','newevents','newmessages','notifications','perks','profile','properties','refills','reports','revives','revivesfull','skills','stocks','travel','weaponexp','workstats'.

ApiTo.name: to
ApiTo.description: Timestamp that sets the upper limit for the data returned. Data returned will be up to and including this time

ApiFrom.name: from
ApiFrom.description: Timestamp that sets the lower limit for the data returned. Data returned will be after this time

ApiStripTagsTrue.name: striptags
ApiStripTagsTrue.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user').

ApiStripTagsFalse.name: striptags
ApiStripTagsFalse.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user').

ApiStripTags.name: striptags
ApiStripTags.description: Determines if fields include HTML or not ('Hospitalized by user' vs 'Hospitalized by user').
